title: Epilachna
text:
Epilachna is a genus of <a href="beetle">beetle</a> in the family <a href="Coccinellidae">Coccinellidae</a>, including several pest species, such as the Mexican Bean Beetle ("<a href="Epilachna%20varivestis">Epilachna varivestis</a>").
Species.
These species belong to the genus "Epilachna":
